1: -module(hty_glob_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -export([all/0]).
    4: 
    5: 
    6: 
    7: -export([
    8:     initial_glob_test/1,
    9:     middle_glob_test/1,
   10:     final_glob_test/1,
   11:     final_glob_fail_test/1,
   12:     double_glob_test/1,
   13:     middle_glob_fail_test/1,
   14:     find_explicit_test/1,
   15:     find_glob_test/1,
   16:     mix_folders_and_files_test/1,
   17:     wild_middle_folder_test/1,
   18:     find_double_glob_test/1
   19: ]).
   20: 
   21: all() -> [
   22:   initial_glob_test,
   23:   middle_glob_test,
   24:   final_glob_test,
   25:   final_glob_fail_test,
   26:   double_glob_test,
   27:   middle_glob_fail_test,
   28:   find_explicit_test,
   29:   find_glob_test,
   30:   mix_folders_and_files_test,
   31:   wild_middle_folder_test,
   32:   find_double_glob_test
   33: ].
   34: 
   35: initial_glob_test(_Cfg) -> test_glob("*moore", "roger moore", true).
   36: 
   37: middle_glob_test(_Cfg) -> test_glob("roger m*re", "roger moore", true).
   38: 
   39: middle_glob_fail_test(_Cfg) -> test_glob("rog* moore", "roger less", false).
   40: 
   41: final_glob_test(_Cfg) -> test_glob("blabla*", "blablabla", true).
   42: 
   43: final_glob_fail_test(_Cfg) -> test_glob("blakbla*", "blablabla", false).
   44: 
   45: double_glob_test(_Cfg) -> test_glob("*o*", "chimpanzee", false).
   46: 
   47: test_glob(Glob, Input, Expected) ->
   48:     Expected = hty_glob:glob(Glob, Input),
   49:     ok.
   50: 
   51: find_explicit_test(Cfg) -> test_find(Cfg, ["apor", "bonobo"], [["apor", "bonobo"]]).
   52: find_glob_test(Cfg) -> test_find(Cfg, ["apor", "*o*"], [
   53:     ["apor", "bonobo"],
   54:     ["apor", "gibbons"],
   55:     ["apor", "gorilla"],
   56:     ["apor", "orangutan"]
   57: ]).
   58: 
   59: find_double_glob_test(Cfg) -> test_find(Cfg, ["**", "h*"],
   60:     [["apor", "gibbons", "hoolock"],
   61:     ["apor", "gibbons", "hylobates"]
   62: ]).
   63: 
   64: mix_folders_and_files_test(Cfg) -> test_find(Cfg, ["apor", "g*"], [
   65:     ["apor", "gibbons"],
   66:     ["apor", "gorilla"]
   67: ]).
   68: 
   69: wild_middle_folder_test(Cfg) -> test_find(Cfg, ["apor", "*", "hylobates"], [
   70:         ["apor", "gibbons", "hylobates"]
   71: ]).
   72: 
   73: test_find(Cfg, Globpath, Expected) ->
   74:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Cfg),
   75:     Fspath = hty_fspath:new(Datadir),
   76:     Actual = hty_glob:find(Globpath, Fspath),
   77:     SortedExpected = lists:sort(Expected),
   78:     SortedExpected = lists:sort(Actual).
